title: Strengthening Data Science Practical Competencies: Expanding Mathematical Thinking in Online Environments: A Phenomenological Inquiry

context.prior_knowledge: Middle school mathematics fundamentals (functions, geometry, statistics)
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Design at least three creative approaches to solve mathematical problems in a VR simulation environment
Identify at least two cognitive barriers encountered when using online learning tools and propose alternatives
Implement mathematical communication skills (symbol usage, argumentation structure) with over 80% accuracy in non-face-to-face learning environments
Complete the mathematical modeling process in three stages (problem definition–solution–verification) through collaborative projects with peer learners

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
